translated_string:
// init NAME_1C, $29
I've got it!
These sections correspond to the power circuits, which are the most important piece of the core!
As far as I can gather, those chips should be in the possession of 8 scientists, and I have one of them.
Ballot!
You want to find your father, don't you? How about we make a deal?
I'll finish the hull of the spaceship, while you go and hunt down the other 7 chips so that we can make this thing fly.
How about that?
notes: thank you dr. leo, very cool

一定就可以打敗
閃電隊了!
translated_string:
// init NAME_BALLOT, $00
This must be the Rainbow Crystal! With this, Dr. Leo will be able to defeat the Volts!

original_string:
// init NAME_BALLOT, $2a
得到彩虹水晶。
translated_string:
// init NAME_BALLOT, $2a
Got the Rainbow Crystal!

original_string:
// init NAME_BLANK, $12
閃電集團莫名奇
妙的跑光了!
又可以恢復工作
了。
從來不曉得，
有工作的感覺是
這麼美妙!

// init NAME_BLANK, $14
霸佔水晶礦坑的
閃電集團消失了
這真是個天大的
好消息。
translated_string:
// init NAME_BLANK, $14
Good news! Those volty guys occupying the mine have disappeared!

original_string:
// init NAME_BLANK, $19
前幾天經過科技
城的發電塔，
結果發現了一隻
好大的貓怪!
真是可怕!
translated_string:
// init NAME_BLANK, $19
A few days ago, while walking past the power plant of the State of Science, there was a giant cat monster! I ran for my life!

original_string:
// init NAME_BLANK, $15
哈哈哈~
老公又有工作了
!
煮頓超豪華料理
吧!

// init NAME_BLANK, $1e
爸爸的口袋裡，
有一顆七彩的水
晶耶!
這是我的寶藏，
才不要給任何人
!

// init NAME_1C, $29
這不是彩虹水晶
嗎?
真是太好了!
等等~
這就把黃金鳳凰
號的核心換掉。

// init NAME_1C, $29
⋯⋯⋯
translated_string:
// init NAME_1C, $29
...

original_string:
// init NAME_1C, $29
⋯⋯⋯
translated_string:
// init NAME_1C, $29
...

original_string:
// init NAME_1C, $29
完成了!
真‧黃金鳳凰號
!
有了這個，
就一定可以打敗
閃電隊了!
translated_string:
// init NAME_1C, $29
It's done!
The True Golden Phoenix!
With this, I can definitely defeat the Volts!
notes: this is definitely leo speaking lol

translated_string:
// init NAME_BALLOT, $00
Sure you can...

original_string:
// init NAME_1C, $29
⋯⋯⋯
有了上次輸了的
陰影⋯
我還是不敢⋯⋯
你就拿我的~
真‧黃金鳳凰號
和閃電隊比賽吧
⋯⋯
translated_string:
// init NAME_1C, $29
...
The shadow of my former loss still haunts me.
I don't dare to try again, so will you take the True Golden Phoenix and go in my stead to battle Team Volt?

original_string:
// init NAME_BALLOT, $2a
得到鳳凰號!
translated_string:
// init NAME_BALLOT, $2a
Got the Phoenix!

original_string:
// init NAME_1C, $29
⋯⋯⋯
有了上次輸了的
陰影⋯
我還是不敢⋯⋯

真‧黃金鳳凰號
和閃電隊比賽吧
⋯⋯
translated_string:
// init NAME_1C, $29
...
The shadow of my former loss still haunts me.
I don't dare to try again, so will you take the True Golden Phoenix and go in my stead to battle Team Volt?
notes: same as 0e:6a00

translated_string:
// init NAME_1E, $27
Haha! So you finally came!

original_string:
// init NAME_1F, $28
在下還以為，
你們夾著尾巴逃
走了!
即使沒有勝算，
還是要比嗎?

// init NAME_1E, $27
峨峨峨峨~
呵呵呵呵!
三千萬就要到手
了!
夢想就要實現了
!
translated_string:
// init NAME_1E, $27
Ehehehehehe!
I can almost feel the crisp 30 million yen in my hands!
It's a dream come true!

original_string:
// init NAME_1F, $28
還是不甘心敗在
在下的手中嗎?
反正再幾次都一
樣。

// init NAME_1E, $27
峨~呵呵呵~
我就展現高貴的
耐心，
再給你們一次機
會吧!
translated_string:
// init NAME_1E, $27
Ehehehe~ I'm not usually this patient, but just this once, I'll give you another chance!
notes: racing game START!

translated_string:
// init NAME_1F, $28
We... We lost?! Impossible!

original_string:
// init NAME_BLANK, $1b
萬歲!
雷歐的鳳凰號果
然贏了!
我早就說過，
雷歐才是最厲害
的發明家!

// init NAME_BALLOT, $00
哈哈哈~
那三千萬的賭金
，
就這麼算了吧!
translated_string:
// init NAME_BALLOT, $00
Hahaha! You won't have to worry about that 30 million yen anymore!

original_string:
// init NAME_BUCK, $01
⋯巴克‧不能‧
笑⋯⋯
巴克⋯⋯想⋯⋯
笑⋯⋯

// init NAME_1E, $27
慢⋯慢⋯慢⋯
慢著著著著!!

極祕密武器!
就是這個按鈕!
translated_string:
// init NAME_1E, $27
H.. HOLD IT!
I still have one last trick up my sleeve!
Remember this remote?

original_string:
// init NAME_1F, $28
在下真是佩服拉
琪的智慧。
只要輕輕這麼一
按~
一按峨!
notes: "thankful for laki's ingenuity" might need rewording

original_string:
// init NAME_1E, $27
沒‧有‧錯!
峨~呵呵呵呵~
就會『磅』的一
下唷!
不管如何，
你們還是準備
三千萬吧!
translated_string:
// init NAME_1E, $27
That's right!
Your precious power plant goes boom!
You'd better hand over that 30 million anyway!

original_string:
// init NAME_BLANK, $19
雷歐博士終於打
敗了閃電隊!
我們之前都錯怪
他了。

// init NAME_BLANK, $17
這裡是全世界最
大的製作高速賽
車的城市。
translated_string:
// init NAME_BLANK, $17
This city has the largest racing car manufacturing line in the world.
notes: from 0e5666

original_string:
// init NAME_BLANK, $1f
很久很久之前，
雷歐的曾祖父和
其他七名科學家
曾經拯救過地球
。
所以城裡的人都
尊敬他。
translated_string:
// init NAME_BLANK, $1f
A long time ago, Leo's great-grandfather and seven other scientists saved the Earth, so everyone in this city respects him.
notes: from 0e576d

original_string:
// init NAME_BLANK, $12
雷歐博士果然是
世界第一的機械
發明家。
translated_string:
// init NAME_BLANK, $12
Dr Leo is certainly the best inventor in the world.

original_string:
// init NAME_BLANK, $13
槽糕⋯
我的水藍鑽石項
鍊，
藏到哪裡去了?
translated_string:
// init NAME_BLANK, $13
Darn it... Where did my diamond necklace go?
notes: this is the mom who didn't hide the machine earlier

original_string:
// init NAME_1D, $1a
荳荳這台光速美
少女初號機，
找到一個藍色石
頭。
光速美少女初號
機~~
使用價值945
6億的粉碎鑽頭
粉碎藍色石頭!
translated_string:
// init NAME_1D, $1a
Dot's lightspeed machine found a diamond, and it used its drill (worth ¥9456 billion) to crush it to pieces!
notes: this is the same kid who had the machine earlier

// init NAME_BLANK, $13
S-slow down! Waaah!
